title: ITT: You share little known tips and trick about your main champ
body:
These threads are always a good read, looking for tips and tricks that only your champion can do.

For example:

Zed: Putting your W over a wall before ulting, allows you to quickly switch to it, and drop all of your Q-E damage while taking no damage. Good for killing squishies when you are low. 

Zeds E doesnt interrupt his auto attack so go ahead and spam that 

Shaco: If you want Q to go on cooldown, cancel stealth by going into recall. Helpful when going into the jungle for a counter jungle.
